sentences.en: A sense of imminent doom was inescapable.
sentences.cn: 一种即将来临的毁灭感无可逃避。

sentences.en: Accounting staff has an inescapable moral responsibility on accounting information quality.
sentences.cn: 会计人员对会计信息的质量负有不可推卸的道德责任.

sentences.en: All men are caught in a inescapable network of mutuality.
sentences.cn: 所有的人,都是相互关联的网络中的一员,谁也无法回避.

sentences.en: An inescapable retro colour filled the place.
sentences.cn: 一种不能忽视的复古颜色充盈了天地.

sentences.en: Continuing education and retraining will be inescapable.
sentences.cn: 继续进修和重新接受训练是不可避免的.

sentences.en: Errors are inescapable incidents in the course of scientific research.
sentences.cn: 在科研过程中,错误是不可避免的事情.

sentences.en: It is the inescapable duty of management to fire incompetent people.
sentences.cn: 辞退能力不足的人是管理阶层无可避免的责任.

sentences.en: Owing to his error in calculation, bankruptcy of his enterprise seems inescapable.
sentences.cn: 由于他的盘算错误, 他的企业的破产似乎是不可避免的了.

sentences.en: She didn’t want to confront the inescapable fact that she would have to sell the house.
sentences.cn: 她不想面对必须卖掉房子这一无法逃避的事实。

sentences.en: That differences should occur was inescapable and natural.
sentences.cn: 此种歧异现象的发生,乃不可避免且是自然的.

sentences.en: The evidence seemed inescapable that light consisted of electromagnetic waves of extremely short wavelength.
sentences.cn: 光是由波长极短的电磁波组成,这一事实看来已经证据确凿.

sentences.en: The impression of villains was inescapable.
sentences.cn: 留下恶棍的印象是不可避免的.

sentences.en: The impression of villainy was inescapable.
sentences.cn: 留下恶棍的印象是不可避免的。

sentences.en: The inescapable conclusion is that he was murdered by someone in his own family.
sentences.cn: 必然的结论就是: 他是被自己的家人谋杀的。

sentences.en: The past, it would seem, inescapable.
sentences.cn: 过去, 看起来是避无可避.

sentences.en: When the proof was inescapable, they wanted to keep it in - house.
sentences.cn: 当证据确凿无疑时, 他们又想使家丑不致外扬.

sentences.en: When we analyzed all this information, the conclusion was inescapable.
sentences.cn: 我们分析了所有这些情况后, 得出了必然的结论.

words.tran_cn: 不可避免的；逃脱不了的

trans.tran_cn: 不可避免的，逃避不了的，不可推卸
trans.tran_en: an inescapable fact or situation is one that you cannot avoid or ignore
